page.title: 14Entertainment in Malhamdale
page.content: There are no theatres ,cinemas or other amenities like that anywhere in Malhamdale.Therefore the community is left to entertain itself. There is an acting group which occasionally produces plays,the latest,"One Friday In Eternity",being performed in Kirkby Malham Church at Easter 1985. A singing group occasionally sings voluntaries during the services at Kirkby Malham Church. A Christmas party is held every year for the children in Kirkby Malham Village Hall,and the children of Airton put on a pantomime every year,produced and directed by the parents.
